title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs and cheese, then combine with pasta and pancetta. Serve with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in tikka paste. Grill chicken. Fry onion, add tomato puree and cream. Simmer sauce and add chicken.
